projects.name: Predicting and Understanding Opioid Use Disorder
projects.description: This project uses a variety of machine learning techniques to predict adults at risk for developing opioid use disorder.

projects.name: Predicting and Understanding Suicidal Ideation
projects.description: This project uses a decision tree classifier to predict individuals at risk for suicidal ideation.

projects.name: The  Demographic Divide in Advanced Placement Subjects
projects.description: This project evaluates how race, gender, and age are related to participation and performance in the AP curriculum.
